name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. David W. SNYDER, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. David W. SNYDER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence and order affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Nathaniel W. Boyd, IV, Wm. H. Proctor, York, for appellant.
Sheryl Ann Dorney, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
402 A.2d 659
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. David W. SNYDER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 21, 1979.
Decided June 22, 1979.
Nathaniel W. Boyd, IV, Wm. H. Proctor, York, for appellant.
Sheryl Ann Dorney, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
